# 18th Meril-Prothom Alo Awards

The 18th Meril Prothom Alo Awards ceremony, presented by Prothom Alo took place on 28 April 2016 at the Bangabandhu International Conference Center in Dhaka, Bangladesh as a part of 2014–15 film awards season.
